Group.Title: Popup
Group.Description: Component that helps you to display popup views in an application.

Sample.Name: PopupGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample showcases popup layout default rendering based on Relative position and rendering at touch point of screen,etc.

Sample.Name: OnBoardHelps
Sample.Title: Onboard Help
Sample.Description: This sample show case the popup layout with animating view.

Sample.Name: DetailsView
Sample.Title: Popup Menu
Sample.Description: This sample showcases popup layout default rendering based on Relative position and rendering at touch point of screen,etc.

Sample.Name: PopupCustomizations
Sample.Title: Popup Customizations
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the various layouts of the SfPopup that comes in handy in a sleek ticket booking app.
